meanings.definition: In a clumsy or awkward manner
meanings.sent1: He walked blunderingly through the crowded room, bumping into chairs and tables.
meanings.sent2: She blunderingly dropped the fragile vase, causing it to shatter into pieces.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried blunderingly to climb onto the couch but kept slipping off comically.
meanings.sent4: The new driver navigated the narrow streets blunderingly, narrowly avoiding collisions.
meanings.sent5: The magician performed blunderingly, making the audience laugh at his failed tricks.

meanings.definition: Making mistakes or errors due to lack of skill or understanding
meanings.sent1: His blunderingly written report was full of spelling mistakes and incorrect information.
meanings.sent2: The blunderingly assembled puzzle had pieces forced together in the wrong places.
meanings.sent3: The blunderingly cooked meal ended up burnt and inedible, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: The blunderingly designed bridge collapsed under its own weight during construction.
meanings.sent5: Her blunderingly chosen outfit clashed in colors and patterns, drawing unwanted attention.
